speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. Am I speaking with Lisa?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is Lisa. What is this regarding?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling about your overdue balance with XYZ Credit. We need to discuss your payment options.

speaker: Customer
text: I don't want to discuss anything. I've asked to be placed on your do not call list.

speaker: Agent
text: I apologize for the inconvenience, Lisa. I will ensure your number is added to our do not call list.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you, please make sure that happens.

speaker: Agent
text: Absolutely, your request is being processed right now. You won't receive any more calls.
